hero.title: Servicio Completo di Carpinteria & Renovacion na Aruba
hero.subtitle: Servicionan profesional di carpinteria, vloer, loodgieter, y renovacion (Oranjestad & mas). Trabou di calidad na bo medida.

homepage_intro.content_p1: AGA Construction Group is a professional full-service carpentry and remodeling company in Aruba delivering high-quality construction, custom woodwork, renovations, and complete property builds.
served_list: U.S. clients building vacation or investment properties
homepage_intro.content_p2: From custom home construction to kitchen remodels, bathroom renovations, structural carpentry, and full property upgrades, our experienced team provides craftsmanship built to last in Aruba’s coastal climate.

craftsmanship.desc: Nos ta entrega trabou preciso, duradero, y di halto calidad na cada proyecto, grandi of chikito.

carpentry.title: Servicionan di Carpinteria
carpentry.description: Nos ta diseña y traha solucionnan di madera na medida cu ta combina funcionalidad, durabilidad, y diseño moderno.

about_page.title: Tocante Nosotros
about_page.subtitle: Servicio Profesional di Mehoracion di Cas & Construccion na Aruba.

story.title: Nos Historia
story.p1: AGA Construction Group ta un compania di mehoracion di cas y construccion full-service basa na Oranjestad, Aruba. Nos ta specialisa den carpinteria, instalacion di vloer, loodgieter, y servicionan completo di renovacion pa propiedadnan residencial y comercial.
story.p2: Nos mision ta pa brinda vakmanschap di halto calidad, servicio confibale, y resultadonan profesional na cada proyecto, sin importa e grandura. Nos ta comprometi pa entrega solucionnan duradero, funcional, y visualmente atractivo na medida di e necesidadnan di cada cliente.

mission.title: Nos Mision
mission.desc: Pa brinda servicionan di mehoracion di cas confibale, profesional, y di halto calidad cu ta mehora e comodidad, funcionalidad, y balor di bo propiedad.

vision.title: Nos Vision
vision.desc: Pa ta un compania di mehoracion di cas y construccion confia y reconoci na Aruba, conoci pa trabou di calidad, profesionalismo, y satisfaccion di cliente.

build_in_aruba.title: Build a Home or Investment Property in Aruba
build_in_aruba.subtitle: Looking to build a house in Aruba? AGA Construction Group specializes in full-service construction and remodeling for both local and international clients.
work_with_list: Americans investing in Aruba real estate
build_in_aruba.content_p1: Building in Aruba requires local knowledge, climate expertise, and reliable project management. Our team guides you from foundation to final finishes, ensuring quality, transparency, and on-time completion.
build_in_aruba.content_p2: Whether you're building a vacation home, remodeling an investment property, or developing rental units, AGA Construction Group is your trusted construction partner in Aruba.
